channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal judge says Trump administration must restore disaster money to Democratic states
item.description: A federal judge has blocked the Trump administration's attempt to reallocate federal Homeland Security funding away from states that refuse to coopera...

item.title: Genocide Lie Enthusiasts Mourn the Collapse of the Genocide Lie
item.description: Anti-Israeli activists have never had much use for factual evidence — why start now?

item.title: How The Southern Baptist Convention Blew Up Its Credibility To Appease The #MeToo Movement
item.description: The Southern Baptist Convention has squandered much of its moral credibility crusading for leftist causes, such as amnesty and DEI.

item.title: Immigrant truckers file suit over California's plans to revoke commercial driver's licenses
item.description: A group of immigrant truckers sued California's Department of Motor Vehicles on Tuesday, alleging the state violated thousands of workers' rights when...

item.title: Trump approves deployment of 350 National Guard members to New Orleans
item.description: The Trump administration is deploying 350 National Guard troops to New Orleans ahead of the New Year, launching another federal deployment in the city...

item.title: NASCAR Legend Greg Biffle Died An American Hero
item.description: Greg Biffle not only succeeded in the highest levels of stock car racing but also helped his suffering fellow citizens after Hurricane Helene.

item.title: Jay Kelly, or Why I Skipped the Sergio Leone Award
item.description: Jay Kelly reminds us that home isn’t merely a place to which you return. It’s a presence you build through daily acts of attention.

item.title: 5 Years Too Late, Fulton County Proves Trump’s Call To Raffensperger Right
item.description: If nothing comes of Fulton County’s admission, the implication will be that election laws can be treated as optional rather than binding.

item.title: Trump's newly appointed envoy to Greenland says U.S. not looking to 'conquer' the Danish territory
item.description: President Donald Trump's newly appointed envoy to Greenland said Tuesday that the Republican administration is looking to begin a conversation with re...

item.title: The Heritage Foundation Implodes
item.description: Heritage has abandoned or downgraded its conservative commitments in pursuit of populist ideological fashions.

item.title: What Issues Do Gen Z Conservatives Care About Most? I Asked AmFest
item.description: Affordability, immigration, and the sanctity of life emerged as top issues for young voters who attended AmericaFest.

item.title: New trove of Epstein files tells tall tales about Trump
item.description: Democrats pounced on lurid stories about President Trump detailed in a new round of documents released from sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's criminal fi...

item.title: Jared Polis Becomes the First Democratic Governor to Back Trump’s School-Choice Plan
item.description: The Colorado governor’s move to boost educational options is one his fellow Democrats should follow.

item.title: ‘E Pluribus Unum’ Means That We’re One People, Not A ‘Nation Of Immigrants’
item.description: The U.S. is not for everyone. To keep the founding fathers' vision alive, it must be exclusive. We are not open to all comers.

item.title: The Fed’s Phantom Tradeoff
item.description: A predictable, rules-based monetary policy would deliver the price stability that labor markets require to thrive.
